t:
“The house isn't haunted.”              


But, a beautiful melody came from the unplugged keyboard.
c:
#keyboard #ghost #house #haunted #lie

#eclectica20 #creativeminds #expresso12



The house owner was lying and the ghost likes to play music.
The structure of the story helps, think of any messaging interface. Someone else's message is on the left, yours in on the right. Similarly, here too, someone else, probably the homeowner, said the first line, but then the narrator heard the sound. Also, if you consider 'isn't' as two words, remove 'but' from the story.
